product_name: The North Face Grizzly Pack Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Grizzly Pack Jacket pairs Polartec(R) Grizzly high-loft fleece with FlashDry(TM) panels to offer lightweight warmth that packs down small for your backcountry adventures. Inspired by bear fur, Polartec(R) Thermo Pro(R) Grizzly fleece combines textures and pile lengths to trap warmth close to the body. Lightweight Grizzly fleece offers an incredible warmth-to-weight ratio and packs down small. FlashDry stretch fleece panels breathe as they let you reach and stretch easily. Thumbholes in cuffs offer extra coverage for warmth. The North Face Grizzly Pack Jacket for women also provides 2 zippered hand pockets and a hem cinch-cord. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Grizzly Pack Jacket pairs Polartec(R) Grizzly high-loft fleece with FlashDry(TM) panels to offer lightweight warmth that packs down small for your backcountry adventures.
